p: Also, studies of CDV complete genome have reported homologous recombination between the P, H, and L genes in vaccine and field strains from different hosts [ 143]. In addition, phylogenetic studies from the complete genome reflect a more accurate strain classification [ 144]. Likewise, all glycosylation sites that may mask antigenic epitopes—which could explain vaccine failures—can be established as other sites of positive, neutral, or negative selection in CDV membrane proteins [ 57, 143, 145].
